body_html:
Reassigning this to @skye, who's currently reconciling the Python and C APIs for importing graphs.

(If the trick @yaroslavvb suggested works, that's only by accident, since we didn't originally intend to provide a way to remap control inputs using tf.import_graph_def(). It doesn't seem too problematic to allow it though...)
body_text:
Reassigning this to @skye, who's currently reconciling the Python and C APIs for importing graphs.
(If the trick @yaroslavvb suggested works, that's only by accident, since we didn't originally intend to provide a way to remap control inputs using tf.import_graph_def(). It doesn't seem too problematic to allow it though...)
body:
Reassigning this to @skye, who's currently reconciling the Python and C APIs for importing graphs.

(If the trick @yaroslavvb suggested works, that's only by accident, since we didn't originally intend to provide a way to remap control inputs using `tf.import_graph_def()`. It doesn't seem too problematic to allow it though...)
